verses.roman:
yadyapi paravyoma sabākāra nitya-dhāma
tathāpi brahmāṇḍe kāro kāṅho sannidhāna

synonyms: yadyapi—although; paravyoma—the spiritual sky; sabākāra—of all of Them; nitya-dhāma—the eternal abode; tathāpi—still; brahmāṇḍe—in the material universes; kāro—of some of Them; kāṅho—somewhere; sannidhāna—the residential places.
translation: "Although They all have Their residences eternally in the spiritual sky, some of Them are situated within the material universes.
